ThreatReward_GameCondition_Joiner.questD.li:
questDescription->[introduction] named [joiner_nameFull] is calling for help! [joiner_pronoun] is hiding from [hidingFrom]. [joiner_pronoun] wants to flee and join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

[condDesc]

Desperate to stay hidden, [joiner_nameDef] claims to be unable to tell you more about [joiner_objective]self.
condDesc(gameCondition==ToxicFallout)->그러나, [joiner_nameDef](은)는 근처의 거대한 독성 화학 폐기물에 불을 질러야만 늑대떼를 죽일 수 있으며, [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 유독성 낙진이 발생됩니다.
condDesc(gameCondition==VolcanicWinter)->그러나, [joiner_nameDef](은)는 근처의 거대한 쓰레기장에 불을 질러야만 무리들을 죽일 수 있습니다. [joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 자욱한 먼지로 태양을 가리게 됩니다.
condDesc(gameCondition==EMIField)->그러나, [joiner_nameDef](은)는 고대 EMI 발전기를 활성해야만 메카노이드를 파괴할 수 있습니다. [joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 EMI 필드가 생성되어, 전기 장치들이 꺼지게 됩니다.
condDesc(gameCondition==HeatWave)->[joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, 위성이 재설정될 때까지 [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 강력한 폭염이 쏟아집니다.
condDesc(gameCondition==ColdSnap)->[joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, 위성이 재설정될 때까지 [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 강력한 한파가 몰아칩니다.
condDesc(gameCondition==WeatherController)->[joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, 위성이 재설정될 때까지 [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 [forcedWeather_label](이)가 발생됩니다.

condDesc(gameCondition==PsychicDrone)->[joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 [psychicDroneGender]에게 맞춰진 [psychicDroneLevel] 수준의 정신파동을 일으켜, [map_definite]에 있는 모든 [psychicDroneGender]들의 기분이 나빠집니다.

condDesc(gameCondition==PsychicSuppression)->[joiner_pronoun]가 오게 된다면, [gameConditionDuration_duration] 동안 [psychicSuppressorGender]에게 맞춰진 정신파동을 일으켜, [map_definite]에 있는 모든 [psychicSuppressorGender]의 의식이 감소하게 됩니다.

ThreatReward_Infestation_Joiner.questDes.li:
questDescription->[introduction] named [joiner_nameDef] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] says [joiner_pronoun] poisoned an underground insect colony, but now [joiner_pronoun] is soaked in insect pheromones and the bugs are hunting [joiner_objective]!

[joiner_pronoun] begs for safety and offers to join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

If you accept, (*Threat)an infestation of [hivesCount] hives(/Threat) will begin in [infestationDelayTicks_duration].

[joiner_nameDef] is too frantic to offer more information.

LanguageData.ThreatReward_Infestation_Joiner.LetterTe: {BASETEXT}\n \n[joiner_nameDef] is soaked in insect pheromones and is fleeing from an infestation. The pursuing insects will arrive shortly.

ThreatReward_Manhunters_Joiner.questDesc.li:
questDescription(animalCount==1)->[introduction] named [joiner_nameDef] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] says (*Threat)a manhunting [animalKind_label](/Threat) is hunting [joiner_objective]!

[joiner_pronoun] begs for safety and offers to join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

If you accept [joiner_nameDef], the manhunting [animalKind_label] will follow in [manhuntersDelayTicks_duration].

[joiner_nameDef] is too frantic to offer more information.

questDescription(animalCount>=2)->[introduction] named [joiner_nameDef] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] says (*Threat)a pack of [animalCount] manhunting [animalKind_labelPlural](/Threat) are hunting [joiner_objective]!

[joiner_pronoun] begs for safety and offers to join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

If you accept [joiner_nameDef], the manhunting [animalKind_labelPlural] will follow in [manhuntersDelayTicks_duration].

[joiner_nameDef] is too frantic to offer more information.

ThreatReward_MysteryThreat_Joiner.questD.li: questDescription->[introduction] named [joiner_nameDef] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] is begging to join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]\n\nThere's some kind of threat following [joiner_nameDef], but [joiner_pronoun] is unwilling to say what it is or when it might follow. [joiner_pronoun] is also unwilling to tell you more about [joiner_objective]self.

LanguageData.ThreatReward_MysteryThreat_Joiner.Letter:
[joiner_nameDef] has admitted what [joiner_pronoun] was fleeing from.
 
[joiner_pronoun] was supposed to marry the child of [enemyFaction_leader_nameFull], leader of [enemyFaction_name]. [joiner_pronoun] became drunk before the ceremony and vomited on the altar - a flagrant insult towards [enemyFaction_leader_nameDef]'s whole family.
 
[enemyFaction_leader_nameDef] swore to seek revenge on [joiner_nameDef] and all those associated with [joiner_objective], and sent [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] to carry out the task.
 
{BASETEXT}

[joiner_nameDef] has admitted what [joiner_pronoun] was fleeing from.
 
[joiner_nameDef] was traveling when [joiner_pronoun] happened upon [enemyFaction_leader_nameFull], leader of [enemyFaction_name], sick on the side of the road. [joiner_nameDef] insulted [enemyFaction_leader_nameDef] by comparing [enemyFaction_leader_objective] to a [Animal].
 
Now [enemyFaction_leader_nameDef]'s [enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] are activating a site nearby to harass you.
 
[allSitePartsDescriptions]

ThreatReward_RaidMultiFaction_Joiner.que.li:
questDescription->[introduction] named [joiner_nameDef] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] admits [joiner_pronoun] profaned a peace ritual between [raid1/enemyFaction_name] and [raid2/enemyFaction_name]. Now they are both chasing [joiner_objective]!

[joiner_pronoun] begs for safety and offers to join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

If you accept [joiner_nameDef], both [raid1/enemyFaction_name] and [raid2/enemyFaction_name] will raid you in [raidDelayTicks_duration].

[joiner_nameDef] is too frantic to offer more information.

ThreatReward_SiteThreat_Joiner.questDesc.li:
questDescription->[introduction] named [joiner_nameFull] is calling from nearby. [joiner_pronoun] is hiding from [threat]. [joiner_pronoun] wants to flee [joiner_possessive] hiding spot and join you at [map_definite].[joiner_relationInfo]

If you accept [joiner_objective], [joinersEnemies] will set up a site nearby to harass you. [site/allSitePartsDescriptions]

The threat will remain until you go to destroy it.

LanguageData.ThreatReward_SiteThreat_Joiner.LetterTex: Since you accepted [../joiner_nameDef], [../threat] have set up a nearby site to harass you.\n \n[allSitePartsDescriptions]
